title: Oven-Roasted Zucchini and Squash

ingredients.name: yellow squash, sliced into 1/2 inch half-moons
Black Mission Fig balsamic vinegar (optional drizzle)

directions: Toss sliced zucchini and squash with olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and dried thyme or Italian seasoning.
Spread into an even layer on a parchment-lined or lightly greased sheet pan.
Roast for 18-22 minutes, flipping halfway through. Look for golden edges and caramelization.
Optionally drizzle with a splash of fig balsamic vinegar right after roasting for a warm glaze effect.
Optionally finish with red pepper flakes or lemon zest.
notes: Can be roasted at the same temperature as red potatoes (425F) for easy meal coordination. A fig balsamic drizzle after roasting ties this side dish perfectly with fig balsamic chicken.
